privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.description: How I handle your data and privacy.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to my portfolio. I respect your privacy and am committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how I look after your personal data when you visit my website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

information.title: 2. Information I Collect
information.content: Currently, this portfolio website is primarily informational. I may collect data in the following ways:
items: Contact Information: If you use the contact form or email me directly, I will collect your name, email address, and the content of your message to respond to your inquiry.
Usage Data: I may use standard web analytics tools to understand how visitors interact with the site. This data is anonymized and helps me improve the user experience.

usage.title: 3. How I Use Your Information
usage.content: I only use your personal data when the law allows me to. Most commonly, I will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
items: To communicate with you in response to your inquiries.
To improve the website functionality and content.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: I have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed.

links.title: 5. Third-Party Links
links.content: This website may include links to third-party websites (like GitHub, LinkedIn, etc.), plug-ins, and applications. Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you. I do not control these third-party websites and am not responsible for their privacy statements.

contact.title: 6. Contact Me
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or my privacy practices, please contact me at:

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.description: Rules and regulations for using this website.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by these Website Terms and Conditions of Use and agree that you are responsible for the agreement with any applicable local laws. If you disagree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from accessing this site.

ip.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
ip.content: All content, features, and functionality are owned by the site owner and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws.
ip.license: You are granted a limited license only for purposes of viewing the material contained on this website.

restrictions.title: 3. Restrictions
restrictions.content: You are specifically restricted from all of the following:
items: Publishing any website material in any other media without prior consent.
Selling, sublicensing, and/or otherwise commercializing any website material.
Using this website in any way that is or may be damaging to this website.
Using this website in any way that impacts user access to this website.
Engaging in any data mining, data harvesting, data extracting, or any other similar activity in relation to this website.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on this website are provided "as is". I make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties. Furthermore, I do not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall I or my suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this website.

governing.title: 6. Governing Law
governing.content: Any claim related to this website shall be governed by the laws of the Dominican Republic without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

projects.description: The #1 company globally specialized in immediate response to cybersecurity incidents. Leaders in digital asset recovery and protection.
Fullstack development for a global leadership platform serving 150k+ professionals. Improved organic traffic by 40% through SEO strategies and reduced server response time by 25%.
Led the digital transformation for Puerto Rico's government portal. Achieved 99.9% uptime and full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, ensuring accessibility for over 3 million citizens.
Drag-and-drop task management SaaS that reduced user onboarding time by 40%. Features real-time WebSocket collaboration for remote teams.
Specialized e-commerce for ornamental fish, aquariums, and accessories. Features product catalog, import services, and comprehensive aquatic supplies.
Certified professional with credentials from IBM and Google. Expert in building secure systems, vulnerability management, and fostering efficient technical environments.
Traffic safety platform that processed 50k+ incident reports in its first year. Integrated real-time mapping systems to reduce emergency response times.
Corporate migration from WordPress to Webflow that increased page speed scores from 45 to 95. Implemented custom API integrations to automate content updates.
High-performance blog engine built for SEO dominance. Implemented automatic schema generation and pillar content structures that boosted keyword rankings.
Official public health portal for Puerto Rico Government. Handled 1M+ monthly visitors during peak demand with zero downtime.
Modern medical imaging platform integrating AI diagnostics. Increased appointment bookings by 60% through a streamlined UX and mobile-first design.
